item.title: Report E-2024060541
item.description:
Report E-2024060541

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-13
  • City: BOWLING GREEN
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately ten (10) gallons of material released from three (3) 5-gallon plastic pails. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and containerized the spent absorbents and damaged pails into one (1) 55-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024060539
item.description:
Report E-2024060539

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-06
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from one (1) 5-gallon metal pail. The released material impacted the trailer floor due to fallen freight that overturned during transit. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the recovered cleanup debris. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024060499
item.description:
Report E-2024060499

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material impacted the concrete terminal floor that released from one (1) 1-gallon plastic pail due to a forklift puncture. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area. The damaged plastic pail and cleanup debris was containerized into one (1) 5-gallon poly pail. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
